segments.text: Excuse me . Could you give me some directions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A gas station . My car ran out of gas two blocks back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Walk straight ahead until you come to the second traffic light . Then turn right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know the name of the street ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't remember , but it's the second light .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , do you know the price of the gas now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid I don't . But I do know the price has gone up .
segments.speaker: S2
